REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0548 reute b f BC-MONY-FUNDING-ISSUES-1 03-03 0087

TEXT.TITLE: MONY FUNDING ISSUES 125 MLN DLR EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Mony Funding Inc is issuing a 125 mln dlr eurobond due April 7, 1997 paying 8-1/8 pct and priced at 101-1/2 pct, sole lead manager Citicorp Investment Bank Ltd said. The non-callable bond is guaranteed by Mutual Life Insurance Co of the U.S. And is available in denominations of 5,000 dlrs and will be listed in Luxembourg. The selling concession is 1-3/8 pct while management and underwriting combined pays 5/8 pct. The payment date is April 7. REUTER
